author: Luca Missaglia
description: This Scotch based riff on the classic Negroni is dry and bitter and benefits from the extra dilution afforded by an additional stir while drinking - Gary "gaz" Regan style.
name: Quintessential Drop
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
